issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:

fields.environment:
java version "1.6.0_30"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_30-b12)

2.6.32-642.1.1.el6.x86_64

CentOS release 6.8 (Final)

comments.body: 5.10.0 is a very old version and there have been many fixes since then.  I would recommend trying a newer version especially because https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-5580 might have fixed this already.
Old version with no reproducer to test on new releases.  Recommend an update to latest and then reopen if issue persists.
